message: Let's start fair, I take the lion's share, but you get a decent piece. Take it or we can play it out.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm offering a more even split.  Don't forget inflation is eating away at this deal for me every round we play.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not going to give away more than this.  Remember, the value of your share is going down with every round!
Alice, this is my final offer. It's a fair split considering the time pressure on my end. If you refuse, I'm prepared to gamble on a later round, even with the losses.
